body_html:
The main problem here is that this code is not registering the conv nn.Modules correctly as submodules of Model. You can check this by verifying that model.parameters() is an empty list.

To fix this, you should set self.conv equal to a nn.Sequential instead of setting self.conv = []. Docs for nn.Sequential can be found here: https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=sequential#torch.nn.Sequential
body_text:
The main problem here is that this code is not registering the conv nn.Modules correctly as submodules of Model. You can check this by verifying that model.parameters() is an empty list.
To fix this, you should set self.conv equal to a nn.Sequential instead of setting self.conv = []. Docs for nn.Sequential can be found here: https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=sequential#torch.nn.Sequential
body:
The main problem here is that this code is not registering the conv `nn.Modules` correctly as submodules of `Model`. You can check this by verifying that `model.parameters()` is an empty list.

To fix this, you should set `self.conv` equal to a `nn.Sequential` instead of setting `self.conv = []`. Docs for nn.Sequential can be found here: https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=sequential#torch.nn.Sequential
